# rafay_cloud_credential (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rafay_cloud_credential" "credential" {
  name         = "testingaws2"
  projectname  = "dev3"
  description  = "description"
  providertype = "AWS"
  rolearn      = "xxxxxxx"
  credtype     = 1
  externalid   = "yyyyyy"
  type         = 1
  accesskey    = "12334234"
  secretkey    = "sdfkls"
  credfile     = "filepath"
}
```
